Detailed Description

Author:
Daniele Basile <asterix@develer.com>

AT91SAM7 Analog to Digital Converter.

Definition at line 56 of file at91_adc.h.

#define ADC_PRESCALER_MASK   0x00003F00

Prescaler rate selection.

ADCClock = MCK / ((ADC_PRESCALER_VALUE + 1) * 2) Prescaler rate selection mask.

Definition at line 72 of file at91_adc.h.

#define ADC_SHTIME_MASK   0x0F000000

Sample & hold time.

Sample & hold time = (ADC_SHTIM_VALUE + 1) * 8 /ADCClock Sample & hold time mask.

Definition at line 87 of file at91_adc.h.

ADC status register.

Status register offeset.

Definition at line 122 of file at91_adc.h.

#define ADC_STARTUP_MASK   0x001F0000

Start up timer.

Startup time = (ADC_STARTUP_VALUE + 1) * 8 /ADCClock Start up timer mask.
